items.title: 【ホロライブ】ときのそら、9周年記念イベント「9th Anniversary Party」をぴあアリーナMMで開催決定！「夢は、ひとつ先のステージへ」
items.author: ホロミ
items.content:
VTuberグループ・ホロライブ所属の「ときのそら」さんが、自身のX（旧Twitter）および公式情報を更新し、活動9周年を記念するイベント『ときのそら 9th Anniversary Party』の開催を特報として発表しました。

開催日は2026年11月7日（土）、会場は数多くのアーティストが伝説を残してきた「ぴあアリーナMM」です。

特報を受け、ファン（そらとも）の間では早くも期待の声が高まっています。横浜の地に響き渡る歌声と、記念すべきパーティーがどのようなものになるのか、11月の開催に向けて注目が集まります。

『ときのそら 9th Anniversary Party』は、2026年11月7日（土）にぴあアリーナMMにて開催予定です。

items.title: 常闇トワ＆獅白ぼたんのサイン入り色紙が当たる！『灰仭巫覡』新PV＆オリジナルソング公開記念キャンペーン開催
items.author: ホロミ
items.content:
大暮維人先生が描く人気漫画『灰仭巫覡（カイジンフゲキ）』のオリジナルソングと新PVの公開を記念し、2025年9月5日より豪華プレゼントキャンペーンがスタートしました。

新PV公開！常闇トワ＆獅白ぼたんが歌うオリジナルソング

2025年9月3日、講談社の「マガジンチャンネル」にて『灰仭巫覡』の新たなプロモーションビデオが公開されました。

このPVのために書き下ろされたオリジナルソング『君と明かした夜』は、ホロライブ所属の人気VTuberである常闇トワさんと獅白ぼたんさんが歌唱を担当。

今回の発表を記念して、抽選で1名様にが当たるキャンペーンが開催されます。

  1. 『灰仭巫覡』公式X（旧Twitter）アカウント（@KAIJINFUGEKI_WM）をフォロー
  2. ※「#灰仭巫覡PV公開」「#カイジンフゲキ」のハッシュタグが付いたポストが目印です。

2025年9月5日（金）0:00 〜 2025年9月14日（日）23:59まで

利用規約に同意し、日本国内にお住まいで郵便物・宅配物の受け取りが可能な方。

注意事項：色紙には当選者の宛名が記載されます。当選者にはXのダイレクトメッセージにて連絡があります。

『灰仭巫覡』コミックス第1巻から第5巻まで好評発売中です。

items.title: 【速報】戌神ころね、ホンダのeスポーツ大会アンバサダーに2年連続で就任！→本人も「よろしくお願いします」と意気込み「世界の戌神」「今年もきた！」
items.author: ホロミ
items.content:
人気VTuberグループ「ホロライブ」所属の戌神ころねさんが、本田技研工業（Honda）が主催するeモータースポーツのグローバル大会「Honda Racing eMS 2025」の公式アンバサダーに、昨年に引き続き就任したことが発表されました。

このニュースに、ファンからは「2年連続はすごすぎる！」「今年も応援します！」といった声が相次いでいます。

「Honda Racing eMS」は、世界3地区（アジア・オセアニア、米州、欧州・中東・アフリカ）のトップドライバーたちが地域最速の座をかけて競い合う、本格的なeモータースポーツのグローバル大会です。

戌神さんは「Honda Racing eMS 2024」でもアンバサダーを務めており、今回で2年連続という大役を担うことになります。

ゲーム実況で人気を誇る戌神ころねと、世界のHondaとのコラボが再び実現しました。

2025年8月26日、Honda Racing eMSの公式X（旧Twitter）アカウントが「━ Honda Racing eMS 2025 開催 ━ 昨年に続き『戌神ころね』が公式アンバサダーに！」とポストし、戌神さんのアンバサダー就任を正式に発表。

あわせて、されるという大会スケジュールも公開しました。

この公式発表に対し、戌神さん本人も自身のXアカウントで「今年もアンバサダーを務めさせていただきます！よろしくお願いします」と引用ポストし、就任への意気込みを表明しました。

この就任のニュースに、ファンからは「世界のHondaに認められた女、戌神ころね」「ころさんの影響力すごい！」「これを機にレースゲームに挑戦してみようかな」など、驚きと喜びのコメントがありました。

items.title: Notice of Price Changes
items.author: HoloearthWebsiteAdmin
items.content:
Thank you for using the Holoearth service.

In a commitment to a more accessible platform for users, we are sold in Holoearth.

The revised prices can be confirmed in the in-app purchase screen from the effective date.

Note: There will be no change to the purchase price of HoloCoin (Premium).

There will be no changes to content that has already been purchased.

This revision applies only to ; user-made items will not be affected. Maintenance will be performed on February 2, 2025 (Fri). The specific time will be shared at a later date.

Thank you for your continued support.

items.title: Visit both Tokyo Station and Narita Airport shops to get an exclusive postcard!
items.author: narita
items.content:
To celebrate the opening of “hololive Meet Pop up Shop: Taking Off at Narita Airport!” we are excited to announce a special collaboration campaign with the “hololive production official shop in Tokyo Station.”

During the campaign period, bring a receipt from one shop to the other to receive an exclusive, limited-edition postcard (not for sale) as a special gift! Don’t miss this chance to visit both locations and collect these unique rewards.

Friday, February 13, 2026 – Monday, March 9, 2026

・ hololive production official shop in Tokyo Station Venue: Tokyo Character Street, B1, First Avenue Tokyo Stationhere for more details.

・ hololive Meet Pop up Shop: Taking Off at Narita Airport! Venue: Central Bldg. 4F, Terminal 1, Narita Airporthere for more details.

1. Make a purchase at either participating shop.

2. Bring your receipt to the other shop.

3. Show your receipt to the staff at the cashier to receive your postcard.* Staff will mark the receipt once the gift has been redeemed.

The exclusive postcards (not for sale) come in 5 designs in total, and designs vary by shop and distribution period.

・ At hololive production official shop in Tokyo Station: Phase 1: Feb 13 (Fri) – Feb 27 (Fri)

Phase 2: Feb 28 (Sat) – Mar 9 (Mon)

・ At hololive Meet Pop up Shop: Phase 1: Feb 13 (Fri) – Feb 20 (Fri)

Phase 2: Feb 21 (Sat) – Feb 27 (Fri)

Phase 3: Feb 28 (Sat) – Mar 9 (Mon)

・ Postcard designs will change according to the schedule at each shop. ・ Supplies are limited and will be distributed on a first-come, first-served basis while stocks last.

・ Only receipts issued during the campaign period (Feb 13 – Mar 9, 2026) are valid for redemption.

・ Each receipt is valid for one (1) postcard.

・ We cannot accept returns or exchanges for the postcard, except in the case of defective items.

・ Please check the official website of each facility for business hours and access information.

items.title: Funko POP! x hololive production Figurines Have Been Announced!
items.author: os_pr
items.content:
February 2, 2026, Tokyo, JAPAN – COVER Corporation (Minato-ku, Tokyo, Japan; CEO: Tanigo Motoaki) is thrilled to announce a collaboration with Funko, releasing a series of POP! collectibles featuring hololive production talents Sakura Miko, Mori Calliope, and Takanashi Kiara. This new collection marks the first collaboration between hololive production and Funko. Fans can look forward to these collectibles hitting shelves and opening for global purchase at a later date, also available on the hololive production OFFICIAL STORE from late March 2026.

For more information on the product release, please visit Funko’s official website and social media platforms.

Funko is a leading pop culture lifestyle brand that creates high quality products for fans to connect with their favorite fandoms. Through its iconic Pop! vinyl figures, apparel, and accessories, the company translates the world’s most popular movies, shows, and digital creators into tangible collectibles.

items.title: NePoLaBo 10-Second Video Contest Results
items.author: HoloearthWebsiteAdmin
items.content:
Greetings from the Holoearth Management Team!

We are pleased to announce the results of the 10-second video contest for the virtual concert “NePoLaBo Live re:VISION Holoearth Live.” Thank you for the many great submissions! All of the entries that conveyed the love for NePoLaBo and the passion of the performance moved the entire staff.

After a careful review, the winning entries that shone especially brightly have been selected and are presented here. Winners will receive a commemorative in-app gift: “NePoLaBo Live Celebration T All Members Ver. (Signed).”

We will contact the winners via X direct message.

Momosuzu Nene Winning Clip

Omaru Polka Winning Clips

レギルスちゅーる(中尉)【雪民】さん An overwhelming display of star power—you can feel the aura from any angle!

The idea to film it behind was brilliant!

See the post here.

Yukihana Lamy Winning Clips

Shishiro Botan Winning Clips

レギルスちゅーる(中尉)【雪民】さん

Holoearth Tourism Agency Special Mentions

らぴす〖雪民〗さん X ID: @lapis5303

The very “Urya-oi!” that became an in-app gesture!

The fact that it captures not just Nene but also Lamy’s dancing really scores points!See the post here.

X ID: This adorable moment between Nene and Botan is captured perfectly!

It is an emotional scene that makes you want to see even more of their close moments.

See the post here.

ANIPLUS x hololive English -Advent- Hanbok-inspired Collaboration Café starts on February 5!
items.author: Horii
items.content:
January 23, 2026, Tokyo, JAPAN – COVER Corporation (Minato-ku, Tokyo; CEO: Tanigo Motoaki) is pleased to announce a collaboration café event between ANIPLUS and hololive English -Advent-, taking place across February 5 – March 22, 2026 in South Korea. This collaboration will take place at ANIPLUS SHOP Seoul and Busan, and centers around an exclusive Hanbok-themed key visual of the five members of hololive English -Advent-.

The members of hololive English -Advent- have collaborated with ANIPLUS to curate delicious menu items that can be enjoyed throughout the event. Fans will also be able to enjoy the talents’ new look through various merchandise, including acrylic standees, can badges, a long mousepad, blanket, and much more!

For more information, please check out the ANIPLUS official social media accounts below.

ANIPLUS x hololive English -Advent- Café Menu Details

ANIPLUS x hololive English -Advent- Café Merchandise Details

ANIPLUS x hololive English -Advent- Collaboration Cafe February 5 – March 22, 2026 Delight Square B101-105, 14 World Cup-ro 3-gil, Mapo-gu, Seoul

Samjung Tower 9F, 672, Jungang-daero, Busanjin-gu, Busan, Republic of Korea

items.title: SPcollect × hololive English Fragrance Mist Series “MEMORIES” Volume 1 Pre-order Begins January 20
items.author: os_pr
items.content:
January 20, 2026, Tokyo, JAPAN – COVER Corporation (Minato-ku, Tokyo; CEO: Tanigo Motoaki) is pleased to announce a collaboration between SPcollect, under IP mixer, Inc., and hololive English -Myth-. Titled “MEMORIES”, the collaborative fragrance mist series will be available exclusively on the SPcollect official website for a limited one-month period starting Tuesday, January 20, 2026, and is available for worldwide shipping.

This collaboration project was personally supervised by Mori Calliope and Ninomae Ina’nis, two members of hololive English -Myth-. Together, they present fragrance mists centered around the theme “MEMORIES”. The collection captures the concept of “The Scent of Memories We Shared”, blending the unique identities of the talents with an immersive fragrance experience.

This product will be available both internationally and in Japan. Pre-order sales will take place for a starting January 20, 2026 (Tuesday) at 12:00 PM (JST) via SPcollect, IP mixer’s collaboration-focused sales brand.

“MEMORIES” Volume 1 Product Details

① “MEMORIES” Fragrance Mist The fragrance mists released in this collaboration are formulated as offering versatile usage across a wide range of settings. They can be enjoyed not only as personal fragrances, but also as room, fabric, or bedding sprays, allowing fans to immerse themselves in the fragrance’s world in everyday moments.

Both talents took part in the fragrance supervision process, designing the scents with inspiration drawn from the moments they have shared with their fans. Guided by their personal visions of fragrance, exclusive theme illustrations were specially created for this project, further bringing the concept and atmosphere of each scent to life.

■ Mori Calliope – Fragrance Notes Introduction Top: Cardamom, Grapefruit, Bergamot, Sweet Orange

Middle: Bulgarian Rose, Amber, Cedarwood, Orris

Last: Vetiver, Musk, Benzoin, Patchouli

■ Ninomae Ina’nis – Fragrance Notes Introduction Top: Fig, Lemon, Raspberry

Middle: Cotton, Tea Leaf, Apple Blossom, Lily of the Valley

Last: Cedarwood, Thyme, Juniper, White Musk

: Fragrance Mist (100 ml) ×1: TWD 1,650 (approx. JPY 8,300)

② “MEMORIES” Fragrance Mist Special Set (with Bonus Items) In addition to the standalone fragrance mist available for purchase, a special fragrance mist set with exclusive bonus items is also being released for this collaboration.

The special set includes an acrylic stand featuring a newly illustrated key visual, as well as a clear card printed with a personal message and signature from the talent, allowing fans to enjoy a complete collectible experience.

The acrylic stand base is specially designed to be displayed together with the fragrance mist bottle, adding a sense of ritual and elegance to the collection. The clear card features a handwritten message and signature from the VTuber, making this a must-have set for fans looking to collect the thoughtfully-designed fragrance sets by Mori Calliope and Ninomae Ina’nis.

Fragrance Mist (100 ml) ×1

New visual acrylic stand ×1

New visual clear card (Includes Message) ×1

: TWD 2,100 (approx. JPY 10,560)

③ “MEMORIES” Fragrance Mist Special Duo Set (with Bonus Items) A duo set that includes fragrance mists from both Mori Calliope and Ninomae Ina’nis, along with additional exclusive merchandise. In addition to the newly illustrated main visual acrylic stand and clear card, this collaboration also includes an exclusive acrylic charm featuring a special design.

Fragrance Mist (100 ml) × 1

New visual acrylic stand × 1

New visual clear card (Includes Message) × 1

New visual Acrylic Keychain × 1

Fragrance Mist (100 ml) × 1

New visual acrylic stand × 1

New visual clear card (Includes Message) × 1

New visual Acrylic Keychain × 1

: TWD 3,950 (approx. JPY 19,860)

Pre-order Sales Information

Fans can pre-order the “MEMORIES” Fragrance Mist series through the SPcollect official website (Global & Japan).

■ YouTube Livestream Announcement Details and product information for this release will be introduced via livestream by Ninomae Ina’nis and Mori Calliope on Sunday, February 8, 2026, at 8:00 PM (JST). Archived viewing will be available after the stream.

IP mixer, a subsidiary of MicroAd, Inc., operates a business focused on planning and selling IP-based products. Collaborating with VTubers and other domestic and international IPs, IP mixer develops and sells original cosmetics, merchandise, and collaborative products for a global audience. Through both original products and tie-up promotions with manufacturers, stores, and facilities, IP mixer maximizes IP value and opens new markets worldwide.

SPcollect is a sales brand operated by IP mixer specializing in IP collaboration projects. With a globally experienced creative team, SPcollect delivers innovative concepts and unforgettable experiences to fans around the world.

items.title: ホロライブ3期生、初の単独ライブの興奮を再び！JOYSOUND「みるハコ」で、2月19日(木)から全…
hololive x CAPSULE Announces “Dive into hololive” Collaboration and Cafe from February 27, 2026!
items.author: os_pr
items.content:
January 19, 2026, Tokyo, JAPAN – COVER Corporation (Minato-ku, Tokyo; CEO: Tanigo Motoaki) is excited to announce the second phase of a collaboration between hololive production, CAPSULE, OU-EN Cafe, and the National Museum of Marine Science and Technology (NMMST): the “Dive into hololive cafe.” Running between February 27 to April 26, fans will be able to partake in photo spots, an exclusive goods pop-up store, and a stamp rally as they dive into the underwater world of Keeleung.

For the collectors out there, the NMMST Pop-Up Store is stocking venue-exclusive merchandise, including random shikishi boards, custom noren curtains, and limited-edition clear files. Fans can also pre-order “Dive into hololive cafe” merchandise from January 21, 2026 at 12:00 PM (UTC+8).

For more information on the event, please visit OU-EN CAFE’s official social media platforms.

“Dive into hololive” is a two-part collaboration event where talents Yukihana Lamy, Ninomae Ina’nis, Koseki Bijou, and Juufutei Raden appear to the fans as “undersea princesses” in a new key visual. The upcoming cafe features a fresh visual identity that exudes an ocean theme, with the four talents debuting brand-new outfits that bring a whole new vibe. Expect a totally different merch lineup at the cafe, too!

Fans can find exclusive on-site merchandise featuring talents as undersea princesses at NMMST.The first round of cafe merch pre-orders opens on January 21, 2026, at 12:00 PM (UTC+8). As a bonus for joining the fun, fans who purchase a “Dive into hololive” NMMST ticket bundle will receive both NMMST stamp rally access and a for limited-edition cafe merchandise to use at the “Dive into hololive cafe.”

Tickets for the NMMST event are selling fast on KKTIX! Check out the full event details below which includes a merchandise pre-order link, and stay tuned to OU-EN CAFE socials for the menu reveal.

Event Information: “Dive into hololive” at NMMST

National Museum of Marine Science and Technology (NMMST) No. 367, Beining Rd., Zhongzheng Dist., Keelung City Feb 27, 2026 (Fri) – Mar 27, 2026 (Fri) Weekdays (Tue–Fri): 09:00–17:00 (Closed Mondays)

Weekends (Sat–Sun): Most areas extended to 18:00

Note: NMMST hours are subject to official museum announcements.

Available on KKTIX and ibon* Pre-order bonuses vary by platform and bundle. Get them while supplies last! * Important: The “Commemorative Ticket Stub” is for collection only. You must present a valid NMMST Main Exhibition Building admission ticket to enter.

Event Information: “Dive into hololive cafe”

OU-EN CAFE No. 25, Jinxi St., Zhongshan Dist., Taipei City Mar 14, 2026 (Sat) – Apr 26, 2026 (Sun)Merch Pre-order: Starts Jan 21, 2026 (Wed) at 12:00 PM (UTC+8)

items.title: ホロライブ3期生、Kアリーナ横浜で2DAYSライブ開催決定！「#きゅるるん大作戦」チケット受付開始
items.author: ホロミ
items.content:
「ホロライブ」所属の3期生（兎田ぺこら、不知火フレア、白銀ノエル、宝鐘マリン）によるライブイベント「hololive 3rd Generation Live #きゅるるん大作戦 〜最強アイドル、推すしかないでしょ〜」を、に「Kアリーナ横浜」にて開催することを発表しました。

本ライブは、「ホロライブ」所属の3期生4名が出演するライブイベントです。

本日10月19日（日）21:00より、現地会場指定席チケットの1次先行（hololive FANCLUB先行 / 抽選）が開始されるとともに、「ABEMA」「SPWN」「ZAIKO」にて配信チケットの販売も開始されました。

チケット情報などライブの最新情報は、下記特設サイト及び開催概要をご確認ください。

hololive 3rd Generation Live #きゅるるん大作戦 〜最強アイドル、推すしかないでしょ〜 概要

hololive 3rd Generation Live #きゅるるん大作戦 〜最強アイドル、推すしかないでしょ〜 主催：カバー株式会社

兎田ぺこら 不知火フレア 白銀ノエル 宝鐘マリン

DAY1 ： 2026年1月17日（土） 開場 16:30 / 配信開始 17:30 / 開演 18:00

DAY2 ： 2026年1月18日（日） 開場 15:30 / 配信開始 16:30 / 開演 17:00

Kアリーナ横浜 （〒220-8507 神奈川県横浜市西区みなとみらい6丁目2−14）

最寄り駅 〇新高島駅 みなとみらい線4臨港パーク口より徒歩5分

〇みなとみらい駅 みなとみらい線2いちょう通り口より徒歩12分

    ※お1人様2枚までお申し込み可能です。 ※チケット氏名印字あり。

    ■1次先行（hololive FANCLUB先行 / 抽選）

    • 受付期間：2025年10月19日（日）21:00 ～ 2025年10月29日（水） 23:59
    • 当選確認期間・入金期間：2025年11月5日（水）15:00 ～ 2025年11月9日（日）23:00
    • ※お申し込みには、hololive FANCLUBへの入会が必要となります。
    • ※別途手数料（先行サービス料440円、システム利用料330円、電子チケット利用料110円）がかかります。
    • 受付期間：2025年11月13日（木）21:00 ～ 2025年11月23日（日）23:59
    • 当選確認期間・入金期間：2025年11月28日（金）15:00 ～ 2025年12月1日（月）23:00
    • ※別途手数料（先行サービス料440円、システム利用料330円、電子チケット利用料110円）がかかります。
    • 受付期間・発券開始：2025年12月14日（日）12:00 ～
    • ※別途手数料（システム利用料330円、電子チケット利用料110円）がかかります。

      2025年10月19日（日）21:00 ～ 2026年2月18日（水）20:00

      公演終了後、公開準備ができ次第アーカイブ視聴可能となり、2026年2月18日（水）23:59 まで何度でもご視聴いただけます。 ※2026年2月18日（水）23:59 を過ぎると、アーカイブ視聴中でも視聴できなくなります。 ※プラットフォームごとに別途手数料が発生する場合があります。

      本公演開催に合わせ、本日10月19日（日）よりhololive 3rd Generation Live #きゅるるん大作戦 〜最強アイドル、推すしかないでしょ〜のライブグッズが解禁されました。

      2025年10月19日（日）21:00 ～ 2025年11月25日（火）18:00 まで

      販売期間や注意事項・詳細は、公式HPの販売ページなどをご確認ください。
